product_name: REI Nalgene Narrow-Mouth Loop-Top Water Bottle - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: Add some color to your water breaks with the 16 fl. oz. REI Nalgene Narrow-Mouth Loop-Top water bottle. It's made with tough Tritan(TM) plastic in attractive translucent colors. Made of Eastman Tritan copolyester, the bottle is completely BPA-free and is dishwasher safe (top rack only). Tritan copolyester provides excellent impact resistance and is suitable for both warm and cold beverages. Easy-pour narrow mouth is also easy to drink from. Loop-top cap stays attached to bottle so it won't get lost. REI Nalgene Narrow-Mouth Loop-Top water bottle is marked with milliliters and fluid ounces for easy measurement.
short_description: Add some color to your water breaks with the 16 fl. oz. REI Nalgene Narrow-Mouth Loop-Top water bottle. It's made with tough Tritan(TM) plastic in attractive translucent colors.
